column5: Does anyone know if it's allowable to bring a 20lb propane tank into Canada?
I'm sure others will provide a more meaningfull response, but I would say that it is certainly allowable. Most RVs and camping trailers carry propane affixed to the units.Regards
Thanks, if would have stoppped and thought I should have realized that..

Eldy,We have been camping in the bush for the past 6 years on our annual fishing trip to the Savant Lake region. We usually bring at least two 20 lb. propane bottles along for cooking, lighting, etc. Never had any problem getting them across the border.Roger B
